ygData.subject: Re: Testing or Sleeping?
ygData.msgSnippet: Fast way to smithing: 1.Dump 21 pt[max trainable] in smithing[have to pay after 15pt] 2.Sharpen weapons that cost more than 2gold..eg 2h swords,halberds to
ygData.messageBody:
Fast way to smithing:

1.Dump 21 pt[max trainable] in smithing[have to pay after 15pt]
2.Sharpen weapons that cost more than 2gold..eg 2h swords,halberds to
27skill
3.From here,u can start making money by selling finished product to
vendor,to fund your contuining learning.Make scalars to 41skill
4.make skewers to 55skill
5.make banded gorget at 55skill
6.all banded xcept tunic,pants,mantle,cloak to 100skill
7.make tunic,pants,mantle at 100skill to 130skill
8.make banded cloak at 130skill
